Key Match Events: Rahmanullah Gurbaz scored 84 runs off 45 balls
Sri Lanka won the match by 4 wickets with 5 balls remaining
Danushka Gunathilaka scored 33 runs off 20 balls
Wanindu Hasaranga scored 31 runs off 14 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Rahmanullah Gurbaz: 'We were short 25 runs or so, cos the wicket wasn't that difficult. I just tried to do my best, but I think the way we finished in the final overs wasn't good.'
Winning Captain Dasun Shanaka: 'It's the belief of the dressing room, we believe we can chase anything in these kinds of wickets. We can always analyse the wicket better when chasing.'
Losing Captain Mohammed Nabi: 'We were about 20-25 runs short, and also we didn't field well or bowl in the right areas.'
Najibullah Zadran getting the Catch of the Match award for his incredible work on the boundary line to dismiss Dasun Shanaka.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Sharjah, United Arab Emirates
The Player of the Match was Rahmanullah Gurbaz
The match was the 7th of the Super Four stage of the Men's T20 Asia Cup 2022
